metadata.title: CVE-2024-45508 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
HTMLDOC before 1.9.19 has an out-of-bounds write in parse_paragraph inps-pdf.cxx because of an attempt to strip leading whitespace from awhitespace-only node.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.17-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
htmldoc-common - 1.9.17-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.17-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
